text: The 1942 Rhode Island gubernatorial election was held on November 3, 1942. Incumbent Democrat J. Howard McGrath defeated Republican nominee James O. McManus with 58.54% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== *J. Howard McGrath, Democratic *James O. McManus, Republican ===Results=== ==References== 1942 Rhode Island Gubernatorial
title: 1942 Rhode Island gubernatorial election
